Trait.Name: Agile
Trait.Desc: This girl is quick on her feet and swift with her hands. She has natural gift of dexterity.

Trait.Name: Blind
Trait.Desc: This girl is blind and cannot see.

Trait.Name: Bad Eyesight
Trait.Desc: This girl needs glasses to see; without them, she is almost blind.

Trait.Name: Sharp-Eyed
Trait.Desc: This girl can see much more clearly than most people.

Trait.Name: Brawler
Trait.Desc: This girl knows how to whoop asses when necessary.

Trait.Name: Clumsy
Trait.Desc: This girl often makes mistakes. Maybe she will learn in time.

Trait.Name: Deaf
Trait.Desc: This girl is deaf and cannot hear.

Trait.Name: Mute
Trait.Desc: This girl is mute and cannot speak.

Trait.Name: Delicate
Trait.Desc: This girl is a delicate flower. She gets tired quickly and bruises easily if she's hit.

Trait.Name: Fleet of Foot
Trait.Desc: This girl is quick on her feet. She can usually outrun her enemies if she can't beat them.

Trait.Name: Fragile
Trait.Desc: This girl is fragile and gets hurt or tired easy. (easy to hurt)

Trait.Name: Open Minded
Trait.Desc: She has no problems trying different things sexually and will accept anything as-is.

Trait.Name: Strong
Trait.Desc: This girl can fight well and is tough. (+combat skills/stats)

Trait.Name: Tough
Trait.Desc: This girl is tough, and can take a lot of punishment. (hard to hurt)
